author: wrowe
msg: Keep window open on configtest and dumpvhostsettings.  Also reverse the
logic as Win32 is the 'exception' that needs to return error 1 to trigger

author: martin
msg: Write log entry for ENAMETOOLONG - it may have been a DoS attack attempt

author: trawick
msg: Use apr_want.h to get the declarations for ntohs et al instead of
including the appropriate system header files directly.
This gets rid of a warning for props.c on FreeBSD 3.4 which cropped
up when I included the right header file to get OS/390 to build :)

author: trawick
msg: mod_status references ap_my_generation; declare it for now
so perchild+mod_status builds; we can add logic to fill in
